Name: amh-muhammedsadiqan-lad
Author: Muhammed Sadiq And Muhammed Sani Habib

Translations.Text: bezīya k’eni sewochi širawochachewini (minidawani) inidīyayu yideregu zenidi (inideyeširachewi) yeteleyayu ẖonewi (kemek’omīyawi sifira) yimelesalu፡፡
yebinanyi kibideti yakilimi melikamini yešera sewi yagenyewali፡፡
yebinanyi kibideti yakilimi kifuni yešera sewi yagenyewali፡፡
